file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-40-03-07 - EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE IV UPPER SIDE SURROUDING ELT UNIT - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE IV UPPER SIDE SURROUDING ELT UNIT - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to clean the EWIS components at Center Fuselage IV, upper side, surrounding ELT unit. B. Zones: 262/264. C. Zone Boundaries ( AMM MPP 06-41-00/100 AMM MPP 06-41-00/100). D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER ALL 05-40-03-100-801-A ♦ FUSELAGE IV (UPPER SIDE - SUR- ROUNDING ELT UNIT) - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-40-03 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-40-03-100-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. EWIS COMPONENTS IN THE CENTER FUSELAGE IV (UPPER SIDE - SURROUNDING ELT UNIT) - CLEANING A. General (1) This procedure obeys the EWIS ICA requirement. (2) This task gives the instructions to do SMRD Task Number: 20-00-00-140-004-A00. (3) You must clean the EWIS components of center fuselage IV, surrounding ELT unit, at zones 262/264, between frame 58 and frame 60. (4) Do not unlace or displace the electrical wiring and components during the cleaning procedure. (5) Do not disconnect the electrical connectors during cleaning procedures. If contamination is found, clean only the exposed areas. (6) Refer to the preparation subtask for access panel information. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400 - WM 20-21-00 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 262 Passenger cabin - RH 264 Passenger cabin ceiling - RH D. Tools and Equipment ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Standard Vacuum cleaner To clean the area EMB-145 - AMM 1285 100-801-A/700 05-40-03 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Cloth, Lint-Free To clean the area AR available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Center fuselage IV - upper side I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the lavatory (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-802-A/400, as applicable). (2) Remove the thermoacoustic insulation from center fuselage IV, at zones 262/264, between frame 58 and frame 60 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-000-803-A/400, as applicable). J. EWIS Components in the Center Fuselage IV (Upper Side - Surrounding ELT Unit) - Cleaning (Figure 701) SUBTASK 160-002-A (1) The cleaning procedure of this task is applicable to specified components or assemblies of an area/zone. (2) Do the cleaning procedure as follows: (a) Use a vacuum cleaner and/or clean and dry cloth to remove the particles from the Center Fuselage IV, upper side, surrounding ELT unit. (b) If contamination is found, clean the EWIS components, surrounding ELT unit. Refer to WM 20-21-00, Section Cleaning Procedures. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the thermoacoustic insulation to zones 262/264, between frame 58 and frame 60 (AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-801-A/400, AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-802-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-81-01-400-803-A/400), as applicable. (2) Install the lavatory (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-802-A/400, as applicable).
